body.name: AmorArc Ceramic Dinnerware Sets for 4, 12 Pieces Square Handpainted Plates and Bowls Set, Chip and Scratch Resistant Stoneware Dishes Set, Dishwasher & Microwave Safe, Reactive Glaze
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 9 mins
features: HEALTHY & EXCELLENT VALUE : These dinnerware set are made of degradable clay making it free of lead and cadmium, NO need to worry about harmful substance leaching into your drinking and food, Twice fired premium ceramic make it sturdy, durable and chip-resistant for long use
WHAT’S IN THE BOX: These series 12-piece dinnerware set includes 4Pcs 10” Dinner Plates, 4Pcs 8.25” Dessert Plates, 4Pcs 5.75” (22OZ) cereal bowls, making it a great set service for 4.

MODERN DESIGN WITH HAND CRAFTED: These dinnerware set feature a clear, reactive glaze finish. Each piece with handcrafted decorative is beautifully individual, adding a touch of sophistication to your table setting. it is perfect for daily using and special occasion.
DISHWASHER AND MICROWAVE SAFE: made of durable stoneware, These dinnerware sets are stackable and dishwasher, microwave, freezer safe! You also can wash them with dish soap and hot water easily

DOUBLE GLAZE AND SCRATCH RESISTANT:Our dishes are fired at 2350℉ for 13 hours making it formimg a sturdy and durable scratch resistant glaze, no need to worry about scratches from your forks or knives.
PERFECT FOR GIFT: Our dishes are feature beatiful glaze with elegant design. Perfect gift for housewarming, Thanksgiving, Christmas and more.
body.description: PREMIUM &HEALTHY CERAMIC Our dinnereware set are crafted from premium, natural ceramic glaze that is free of Lead and Cadmium. This ensures that you can enjoy your meals without any concerns about harmful substances leaching into your food or drinks. The clay used to make these bowls is fired at 2300℉ for 12 hours, resulting in a sturdy, durable, and chip-resistant product that will last you for years to come. Additionally, the clay used is degradable, which is great news for anyone who cares about the environment. 10inch Plates, 8.25inch plates and 22oz Bowls MODERN & STYLISH DURABLE AND CHIP-RESISTANT STUNNING REAVTIVE GLAZE

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At AmorArc, we strive to improve your quality of life by providing a wide selection of modern and traditional kitchenware that can beautify your home and enhance your dining experiences. Our plates, bowls, and mugs are designed to elevate every moment of your life, and bring joy to your daily routine. Whether you're enjoying a leisurely breakfast, a cozy dinner with your family, or hosting a grand dinner party, AmorArc's kitchenware is the perfect addition to your dining table, creating a welcoming atmosphere that will make your guests feel right at home.

WHY CHOOSE THESE DINNERWARE SET LEAD-FREE DISHWASHER SAFE MICROWAVE SAFE UNIQUE DESIGN PREMIUM &HEALTHY CERAMIC Our dinnereware set are crafted from premium, natural ceramic glaze that is free of Lead and Cadmium. This ensures that you can enjoy your meals without any concerns about harmful substances leaching into your food or drinks. The clay used to make these bowls is fired at 2300℉ for 12 hours, resulting in a sturdy, durable, and chip-resistant product that will last you for years to come. Additionally, the clay used is degradable, which is great news for anyone who cares about the environment. 10inch Plates, 8.25inch plates and 22oz Bowls MODERN & STYLISH DURABLE AND CHIP-RESISTANT STUNNING REAVTIVE GLAZE

DISHWASHER &MICROWAVE SAFE Premium clay that is fired at a high temperature Twice to create a reinforced these ceramic bowls, make it safe for dishwasher, microwave and freezer. MAKES FOOD TASTE EVEN BETTER Elevate your dining experience with our beautifully designed ceramic dinner plates. Not only do they add a touch of elegance to your table, but they can also enhance the flavor and presentation of your favorite dishes, making mealtime a highlight of your day. EASY TO STACK The plates feature a matte reactive glaze that not only enhances their appearance but also provides resistance against wear and tear. This design allows the plates to be stacked securely, optimizing storage space in your cabinets or shelves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If I could give 500 star review I would. These plates are beautiful, smooth, unique, and wash well. Absolutely perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and good quality
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE these dishes!! They are a beautiful color and made well. I love that they are individually finished so that there’s a slight variation.. almost unnoticeable but makes them feel handmade.There dishes were securely packed and I already got a follow up from the seller.Highly recommend!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handmade reasonably priced
reviews.reviewText: These dishes are just beautiful. Handmade finishing really shines - there’s just the right amount of variation from one piece to the next. The weight isn’t insane. They are extremely well packaged. I love the shape of the bowls. They are a little warmer in color overall than I was expecting, but that’s not a bad thing for me. If you’re hoping for a cooler taupe, this isn’t for you. Otherwise, you will not be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Let me just say I never right reviews but these are INCREDIBLE. I bought these for our new house and would buy them ten times over. They’re gorgeous, easy to clean and beautifully made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for my cabin and love the color! Perfect size bowls!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These sets meet their description!
reviews.reviewText: Really liked this dish set, and ordered 2 of them. Contrary to what others have posted, the dishes all matched fine from both sets. Sturdy and each one a little unique; really adds to the charm! So far, no scratches from the silverware, and we've had them about 2 weeks. The bowls are a bit shallow, compared to other sets, but they work fine of course!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully finished dishes. Each piece is Unique.
reviews.reviewText: These are beautiful dishes: the shape and finish are gorgeous and the company's customer service is excellent. I have three sets plus 6 more plates in cappucino. They are classic and contemporary at the same time. Love the uneven edges and the ceramic finish is gorgeous. I purchased capuccino color and it blends beautifully in my kitchen with my granite countertops. There was a small problem with several plates and the company sent replacements right away. I am a happy customer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You can expect everything within the same box to match, but if you order 2 boxes sent expect them to.These are nice & heavy, classy looking if even a bit old world or rustic.The bowls are perfect..not too big, small, deep or steep.Really like them :-)
El acabado es muy bueno. El diseño es tal cual como en las fotos.

I absolutely love these, they are stunning. I wasn't entirely sure what colour they were going to be from the pictures, I was hoping for green and they mostly are a sort of sagey green. Some have a bluish green on them as well, which is really pretty. I truly love them - first set of dishes in my adult life that I have honestly loved. The shape of the bowls is awesome too, low but not too low. I'm planning to order the mugs. I was going to get the pasta bowls but honesty these ones are big enough I don't know that I need them.

reviews.reviewTitle: Have I found the perfect everyday dishes?
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these dishes. I initially purchased the individual sets of 6 dinner and dessert plates, then came back to buy this set to bump up my total serving sets, and add the bowls (which are the perfect shape and size for just about anything). The pattern and color are beautiful, but still very neutral. Not light and flimsy feeling, but not ridiculously heavy or bulky either.

Love this set! Each piece is unique in shape. Colour is beautiful. Very well packaged. Ordered 3 sets and nothing was broken. I was worried the plates were going to be really heavy but they are a nice weight to them. The bowls stack and fit together so they don’t take up much room. Would recommend
I looooove this set, so happy with it! Have ran them through the dishwasher without issues. Sturdy and look so good in person
